content:
/>
X.iv.4.2.c
.
Effect of Renouncement of the Right to DIC on Other Beneficiaries of the Same Class
If VA is paying DIC to multiple beneficiaries in the same class (multiple children of the same Veteran, for example), renouncement of the right to DIC by one beneficiary will
not
have the effect of increasing the rate of DIC payable to any other beneficiary in the same class.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 4  - Renouncements
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section None
